attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: First of all I do not like Donald trump and only did this to get rid of the app so thank you so Tik tok second of all I swear to I my god why do you have to do this to tiktok don’t shut it down bc people will come for you 😌 third it’s just fun to do this to a racist and disgusting president which is not my president Obama is my president not you so again thank you tiktok bye that’s all racist man😚😚😚

attributes.title: orange peel
attributes.review:
I soon as I opened the app I saw an orange🍊I thought this app was about the President not about an orange??? Anyway it took me 4 weeks to download this app and it wasn’t even worth it. I almost threw up looking at those pictures and also a message popped up saying “you’re ugly” with a cockroach next to it. Sir i don’t want an orange telling me I’m ugly. Periodt. Anyway this is for trying to ban tiktok bunker boy👨 
👁👄👁

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: Once I got this app weird things started to happen, like I had bad luck, I started to have bad dreams and I started to hear voices and it was very strange, Karen’s started to pop up out of know where and start arguments with me, it was so strange, also I started to hallucinate this trump flags everywhere but once I deleted the app it all stop my life was normal once again 👁👄👁🤠🤠🤠🤠

attributes.title: 🤮🤮🤮Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded President 🤡 Trump’s 🍊new app to catch up with the idiocy 🙈 of the boomers 👵🏻🧓🏻, and right off the bat🦇 , Mr. Orange Peel’s slogan 💬 is just wrong 🙅🏾‍♀️❌😡. Instead of MAGA 🤡 it’s KAGA 🤮🤮. Like EWWWW. And to make matters worse 📉, the first thing I saw 🙈👀 when I opened the app is Mr. Duck Fluff’s 🦆 ugly 🤢 face. Absolutely traumatizing 💀💀. I would give it less than a 1/5 if I could. Y’all hillbillies 🤠 better grow some brains 🧠 and #settleforbiden2020 🇺🇸. Peace ✌🏽

attributes.title: Disappointed🤬😭
attributes.review: Terrible layout, colors and overall flow. It’s almost as if the cheeto man tried to make it himself. Unusable and very lacking in every way possible. I hate it, definitely do not download to experience the same amount of pain I did, you’ll just be forced to spend time writing a review because of how absurdly terrible the app is.

attributes.title: Huge disappointment!!
attributes.review: I got this app hoping for helpful information about the upcoming election, but was met instead with cluttered, hard to navigate pages. Not only was the information nearly impossible to extract, but the app kept crashing whenever I tried to click on the different sections. Terrible! Do not get this!

attributes.title: Horrible app for a horrible president
attributes.review: I am not a TikTokker or anything like that? but I got this app because I wanted to see what all the buzz was about with our President but I can tell that this app is just like everything else about this man: GARBAGE. I strongly advise the Apple store to remove this app because it is useless and a very boring use of my time. I’m disappointed but not surprised.

attributes.title: Too cluttered
attributes.review: The moment I opened this app, I saw a picture of trump so I deleted it just like any normal person would. However, my wall screen turned to trumps face. I was very mad because my old wall paper is now missing. In fact, all my pictures turned into trumps face. I had to power my phone off for a week! Do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Keeps crashing
attributes.review:
So I got this app because I wanted to see what trumps views were and what he had planned for the next four years. I opened the app and automatically got thrown out. I tried turning my phone off and deleting the app but it wouldn’t work! I tried putting my phone number in too but it wouldn’t let me type! 
#biden2020

attributes.title: Worst app ever, what a waste of space
attributes.review: Hi yes a demon overtook my body and forced me to download this app. When I came to and saw that I had downloaded something supporting an orange balding racist pedofile...I had a heart attack. Luckily I have since then recovered. Let this be a sign to others who wish to download this app....it will most surely try to kill you. Or perhaps even worse...turn you into a republican.
